attributes.title: i’m so disappointed!! 😡😡😡
attributes.review: I decided to embark on a very AMERICAN journey, as an American, and download this app. To start off, after it slowly downloaded, which I calculated to take exactly 11037 days, I opened the forbidden app. Once I opened it, I was left with a much larger shock. THE ENTIRE APPS OPENING SCREEN BLINDED ME. It was so terribly designed that my vision was impaired and soon enough I couldn’t see, in which I then fainted from the shock. My girlfriend took me to the hospital and told the doctors “Please help her! The terrible Cheeto president’s terrifyingly ugly and dysfunctional app blinded my girlfriend and she fainted!” So, they fixed me up, but I’m now blinded for life from this terrible app😡😡. I then fell into despair and tried to delete the app, but Junko kept popping out of my screen and smashing my fingers with a tiny hammer, which is bad since my sense of touch is what I rely on severely!!! I then had to get my phone smashed and had an exorcism done on it, and spent SO much money to buy a new phone!! The curse this app brought me is impairing my ability to live my day to day life, EVEN AFTER the exorcism 😡😡 I will never forgive this orange!!!

attributes.title: App tried to buy a butt plug in my name?
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking “why on earth does it have so many bad reviews?” And at first I couldn’t tell what the problem was. When I first opened it, this app is exactly what I expected, another way to support our president. Then upon using it I started to notice alarming things like “sex workers for trump” and “butt plugs for trump” and I was so confused so when I clicked on the event my card was charged $69 for a new butt plug and I’ve never used a butt plug in my life! When I tried to cancel the order a pop up appeared saying “your butt plug is on its way to the president” has anyone else had this problem? Anyways I’m on the phone with my credit card company trying to get my money back. Bad app, worse products!!!

attributes.title: this was horrific ✨🧚🏼❤️
attributes.review: i got this app to support the hottest & most amazing president we have ever had! he is 100% not racist and 100% not homophobic. i was so excited to open this app & start my journey as a happy republican. then, you will not believe what happened next!!! a bunch of bots started spamming my phone and sending me donald’s toe pics! i was scarred for life & my 12 year old daughter even saw them!!! i tried over & over to delete the app but NO!!! it just wouldn’t work. this app is just an extreme mess too! whenever i got on, it took 45 minutes to load when his next ralley was. it also showed me donald trumps back moles & hairline zits! i will no longer be voting for this acne-filled president & i will no longer even be apart of the republican party. this RUINED it. now i have to spend all my time on Tiktok to get my mind off of this tragedy❤️. i recommend Tiktok 100%. :).

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: This took a solid 42 hours to download and if that wasnt enough, it made my phone crash when i opened it 😱😱😱. i love my crusty orange president but this app was disgustang. first of all, when i opened the app, i saw this piece of ridiculous piece of orange colored poop, i was so shocked on how ugly and crusty it was, i had a massive heart attack. i slowly started to get blurry vision and it was getting black... i had died. this app is so crusty and disgusting. i do not want to see a crusty gross bald piece of poop when i open this app. next time, please make it bernie sanders when i open it. this app is a huge no❤️.

attributes.title: THIS APP WILL RUIN UR DEVICE!
attributes.review: I would like to say that I recently got this new iPad like one day ago and I got this app with the hopes of learning more about the 2020 election. 1 second after I opened this app my whole iPad turned the orange of trumps skin then, because it’s such a hideous color I threw up and ruined the brand new iPad!  I give this app a -1000/10 because no one was able to repair my device!
